column4: is there a program which i can use on linux to stream mp3's from my windows box?
you want to play streaming mp3 (being streamed from a m/c)?
m/c? ....i have mp3's on my windows box, on my local network, which i'd like to stream on my linux laptop
use vlc to stream the mp3s from the windows box, and use any player like xmms to play the stream
